name: Kennedy Park Resort
description: There’s plenty of fun right on your doorstep at Kennedy Park Resort, including a fantastic playground complete with jumping pillow, gym, sky theatre, entertainment room, free Wifi and much more. Choose from a vast range of accommodation options, from contemporary self-contained villas, motel units to cabins and camp sites. There’s also a swimming complex, complete with a heated swimming pool and separate pool for the kids with fountains to keep them entertained for hours! And at the end of a lazy day, if you don’t feel like cooking or going too far, dine in Storkey’s Restaurant – our onsite Cafe restaurant and bar.

houseRules.notes:
Booking terms & conditions

When booking online or directly with Kennedy Park Resort other than as is provided for by legislation and as follows, I agree that Kennedy Park Resort Napier accepts no responsibility for loss or damage to motor vehicles or guest property.

 

Electrical WOF & Tent RCD Lead - Vehicles using power sites must have a current electrical Warrant of Fitness (WOF) & certification. Tents must have the correct tent RCD lead which can be bought from camping shops etc.

Powered Sites - Some sites have water and/or drains on-site. Some sites have trees. RCD-protected Caravan plug or Adaptor required. Vehicles must have valid Electrical Certificate of Fitness.
Non Powered Sites - Some sites have water and/or drains on-site.
Gate Access and Visitors
In order to comply with Health & Safety regulations, ALL VISITORS are required to register at reception upon arrival. (Subject to management discretion).
Gate codes are issued to vehicles individually and must not be shared as this will cause them to cease functioning. You must use your gate code every time you enter or leave our Resort and every time you depart our Resort, failure to do so will cause them to cease functioning. Your gate code will be deactivated on the day of your departure at 10.00am.

Smokefree Resort

For the comfort and safety of all Guests, Kennedy Park Resort Napier is Smokefree. This means that smoking is prohibited within the Resort grounds by all Staff and Guests.

We have a designated smoking area next to the main carpark.

A minimum $250.00 cleaning fee will be incurred for smoking in the Resort Accommodation Units and Buildings. 

 

Damage

Total costs for any other damage to resort property will be at the discretion of Resort Management at the time of check out.

 

Behaviour
To promote a peaceful environment Kennedy Park Resort Napier has a strict No noise policy after 10.00pm or before 7.00am. The only exception is New Year’s Eve, when we extend this to 1.00am.

Guests are asked to be considerate in regards to noise levels and offensive language. If management considers your noise to be excessive or offensive to other guests, you will be asked to turn it off or down. To ensure all our guests have a great experience, we expect common sense and consideration to be shown at all times, to other guests, staff and management.

Management reserves the right to refuse admission and remove from the Resort any person who, in their opinion, does not conduct themselves in a decent and reasonable manner. No refund will be made in such circumstances. Please notify Reception or Management of any problems or disturbances immediately when it occurs.

No Gang Patches are to be worn whilst you are staying at Kennedy Park Resort Napier, all gang patches must be removed before access will be permitted. Refusal to remove gang patches will result in access to our Resort being denied

 
Check-in time from 2:00pm. Check-out time by 10:00am. No early check-ins or late check-outs during peak times. Please advise if you are arriving later than 9:00pm.


CANCELLATION POLICY:

Reservations are confirmed only on receipt of deposit. 

- Balance of accounts are payable on arrival. No reduction for early departure or late arrivals.
- A $15.00 administration and cancellation fee will be deducted from all deposits refunded due to cancellation. Refunds are only guaranteed if the reservation is cancelled with 1 days notice.

- If a cancellation event occurs (see definition below) where we need to cancel your booking we will refund 100% of the accommodation deposits paid.

We look forward to welcoming you to Kennedy Park Resort Napier and ensuring your stay is a truly memorable one. In the meantime, if we can be of any further assistance please feel free to contact us
